name: Window Unlock
short_description:
The program lets you to control any window in your system. You can send control messages to a window like: minimize, close, block, unblock, hide, restore, etc. Be careful with this software, DO NOT touch windows like(desktop, start menu, task bar, etc) because you can mess it up and cause a system malfunction. This software is useful to unblock a program(which is a trial version) that has already expired. Well, when you open the program first will appear the registration window, and below, the window of your program(which is usually blocked or disabled). With this software you can unblock it and continue using it, but you must do that every time you launch your program.

For any questions or suggestions, email me at: bozhidar1991@gmail.com
